text: <!channel> At the end of each remaining lecture before April 15th, there will be time for either a quiz or, if there is no quiz, time for working on the project. On Tuesday 3rd, we will have quiz #10. On the 7th, there will be an optional quiz (#11). If you already have six good quiz scores, you don't need to do #11 and can work on your project (but please do that outside so as not to disturb).
Please note the exam schedule (Blackboard calendar). I am not planning to change this.
